channel.title: Nicholas Guyett - Professional Web Developer
channel.description: Nicholas Guyett is a self-taught, full-stack web developer with experience using php, ruby, and javascript (client-side and serverside). He is available for hire or for freelancing.

item.title: Locksies Design School
item.description: For this project, I created a custom framework and utilized jquery-uiâ€™s drag and drop library. In the Fashion Design school, users start by selecting the one of the dolls to use as a base, and then can drag different cloths and accessories onto the dolls. Some items have customizable sub options which automatically popup when the selected.

item.title: This Site!
item.description: I built this entire site using jekyll, bootstrap, and sass. It is hosted on github pages.
